auth.description:
To Obtain the following credentials:
1. Visit https://developers.facebook.com/
2. Create an application, Select Other for Usecase.
3. Select Business as App Type.
4. Copy App Id and App Secret from Basic Settings.

upload_photo.name: upload_photo
upload_photo.description: Upload a photo to an Instagram Professional Account

photo.description: A URL we can access for the photo (JPG only)

upload_reel.name: upload_reel
upload_reel.description: Upload a reel to an Instagram Professional Account

video.description: A URL we can access for the video (Limit: 1GB or 15 minutes)
